the smallest size recommended for mixed-case

text or labels. Labels in all caps can be 11pt.

Arrival in Virgina: August 1619

After capture by the privateers, the Africans arrived in the new English colony of Virginia.

America

Journey’s Start: March/April 1619

The Spanish slave ship San Juan Bautista leaves Luanda, the capital of Portuguese Angola, with approximately 350 enslaved Africans from the Kingdom of Ndongo.

Pirates of the Caribbean: July 1619

Before reaching the Spanish colony of Vera Cruz, the slave ship was attacked by English privateers, the White Lion and the Treasurer. Instead of gold, the privateers found enlaved Africans, 50 of whom they stole.
